titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to study methods to reduce accidents on Federal-aid highways caused by drivers falling asleep while operating certain commercial motor vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/9/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to conduct and report to the Congress on a study of methods to reduce accidents on Federal-aid highways caused by drivers falling asleep while operating a commercial motor vehicle used to transport freight.
